message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $9500?
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $8500.
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $9000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $8500 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
